document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Parapinnanema (Nematoda, Chromadoridae) from Dr Theodor Mortensen’s Pacific Expedition 1914 – 16 with an identification key to the genus

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Parapinnanema (Nematoda, Chromadoridae) from Dr Theodor Mortensen’s Pacific Expedition 1914 – 16 with an identification key to the genus

bibRefCitation.author: Inglis
bibRefCitation.refString: Inglis, W. G. (1969) Convergence in the structure of the head and cuticle of Euchromadora species and apparently similar nematodes. Bulletin of the British Museum (Natural History), Zoology 17, 149 - 204.

subSubSection.paragraph:
List of valid species: The present list of valid species is in accordance with
Gourbault & Vincx ( 1994 )
. For each species taxonomical notes and geographical distribution are provided.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
